name: Pin.Tail.Donkey. Free
description:
A simple version of the classic party game - can you find that pesky Donkey??

Try to find the Donkey in as few touches as possible. We're counting! To help you out, every time you place a tail it will be graded from BLUE (far away) to RED (close). Use this to help you out.

Ad-supported free version - upgrade to remove the adverts and enable 3 extra characters:

- Pin the crown on the Princess
- Pin the beak on the Penguin
- Pin the funnel on the Train
